metadata.synopsis: One-liner with a priest that is arguing with his colleague, after the player participated in their group dialog; "Some of them want to flee to the city, but others say they can't just abandon the temple, especially with their wounded head priest hovering between life and death"This priest considers staying.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_AClick on |Arguing Priest 002| - S_WYR_OpenHand_ArguingPriest_002 888f7b75-bae2-487b-a631-aad7be93a29b - (-25; 45; 2)This will start a group dialog between him and his colleague. Wait for it to end and then click on him again.

0.speaker: Brother Clements
0.text: Times may be hard, but the God on the Rack asks that we endure. For him.

1.speaker: Brother Clements
1.text: Please, if you have business here, seek Sister Yannis.

2.speaker: Brother Clements
2.text: Perhaps now we can let Father Lorgan's memory rest, and honour his wishes. To keep the faith.
